tool_description: Car Manufacturer and Vehicle Specifications Data. Over 1300 of the top current brand cars.
name: Car Manufacturer Vehicle Specifications
title: Car Manufacturer Vehicle Specifications

api_list.name: Cars: Search Any Field
api_list.description:
search category title, change category to field name to search search from fields available replace category with field name and search_value=value with the search value. Cars. You can change **make ** to any available field to search.

This example will show all cars with the make Volvo
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://car-manufacturer-vehicle-specifications.p.rapidapi.com/cars/search_list/make/?search_value=Volvo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "car-manufacturer-vehicle-specifications.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://car-manufacturer-vehicle-specifications.p.rapidapi.com/cars/search_list/make/?search_value=Volvo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Cars: List all fields from multiple items
api_list.description:
Pass in multiple items into this search and return results from Cars. max = number items to return.

This example searches for the make Volvo and the model XC90 showing a max of 10 results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://car-manufacturer-vehicle-specifications.p.rapidapi.com/cars/search_multi/?make=Volvo&model=XC90&max=10"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "car-manufacturer-vehicle-specifications.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Cars: Distinct List of Any Field Values
api_list.description:
for example if you want to get a distinct list of make that exist from Cars. this should show a distinct list in json array.

you can change the value make to any available field to return distinct values
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://car-manufacturer-vehicle-specifications.p.rapidapi.com/cars/search_distinct/make"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "car-manufacturer-vehicle-specifications.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Cars: Latest 50 - 100 Items
api_list.description: show the latest items from the range starting at 50 and showing 100 items from Cars
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://car-manufacturer-vehicle-specifications.p.rapidapi.com/cars/latest/50/100/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "car-manufacturer-vehicle-specifications.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
